sword.title: Orcvenom Sword
blocks: Passive: +1 dice poison damage against Orcs
Passive: +1 to attack rolls.

tacwit.title: Tacticians Wit
blocks: Passive: +1 to Initiative rolls
Once per day, after Initiative is rolled, swap your Initiative score with that of another willing creature.

sol.title: Sol
sol.subtype: Martial melee weapon, Heavy, Two-handed. 2d10 bludgeoning damage
blocks: The highest damage dice rolled may cause Radiant damage instead of Bludgeoning, at your discretion.

Action: Spend 1 Charge. Holding the weapon aloft, it begins to glow as bright as the sun. For the next hour, the weapon emits bright light out to 60ft and dim light out to 120ft. The bright light counts as Sunlight for the purposes of magical effects. Any magical darkness up to level 3 which is covered by this bright light is dispelled immediately.
Action: Spend 1 Charge. Cast the Sanctuary spell on yourself.
Sol holds 1 charge, which recharges during a long rest.

cloudreign.title: Cloudreign
blocks: Action: Target a creature you can see within 10 feet of you to learn its surface thoughts and pull the thoughts learned out of the creature's head as a tangible glowing string of energy known as a thought strand. The strands can be stored indefinitely in the vial or until the vial reaches capacity, in which case the oldest strands dissipate. A creature affected by the vial knows that its thoughts are being probed.
Thought strands created using the Encode Though cantrip can be stored in the item. Such strands have their duration extended indefinitely.
The vial has 3 charges and can store up to 3 thought strands. It regains all its charges daily at dusk.

If attuned to a character with the Psi Warrior subclass, the stored thoughts can be spent as additional Psi dice (d4). If the thought is a particularly powerful one, the dice may be higher, at the DMs discretion. Psi Warriors attuned in this way also increase their Intelligence ability score modifier by +1 for the purposes of their psionic powers, and also learn the Encode Thoughts cantrip.

rest-periapt.title: Periapt of Effective rest
blocks: Passive: Reroll any spent hit dice once per dice.

swashbucklers-leathers.title: Swashbucklers Leathers
blocks: Passive: When you take the Dodge action, you may still make one attack roll.

suffer-ring.title: Ring of Suffering

stablemind.title: Stablemind Breastplate

Action: Spend 2 charges. Remove the Charmed condition from yourself.
Stablemind has 6 charges. During a short rest, roll a d6 for each used charge. On a 4+ it is restored.

timeweave-focus.title: Timeweave Lens

ficklesilver.title: Ficklesilver Plate

letterguarantee.title: Letter of Guaranteed Delivery
blocks: A simple piece of parchment and an envelope. After writing a letter on the parchment and a person's name on the envelope the letter vanishes, reappearing in the vicinity of the addressee. The letter can only be opened by the addressee, and will continue to reappear near them until it is opened.
The adresse may also write a letter on the back of the parchment at which point the letter returns to the sender in the same way. After returning, the item loses its magical abilities.

foldlattice.title: Foldlattice Shield

shadowseer.title: Shadowseer Monocle
